member.name: T:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListViewSelectedItemCollection
member.summary: Implements a strongly typed collection of elements that are currently selected in a .
member.remarks: ContainerListViewSelectedItemCollection provides an that is strongly typed for elements. The items always are maintained sorted by the item's position in the list.

member.name: M:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListViewSelectedItemCollection.Add(DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListViewItem)
member.summary: Selects existing object to the list.
member.param: The ContainerListViewItem object to select.

member.summary: Always throws , use the Add method instead.

member.summary: Removes a object from the selected list.

member.summary: Adds an array of objects to the selected item collection.
member.param: An array of objects to add to the collection.

member.name: M:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListViewSelectedItemCollection.IndexOf(DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListViewItem)
member.summary: Returns the index within the collection of the specified item.
member.param: A representing the item to locate in the collection.
member.returns: The zero-based index of the item's location in the collection. If the item is not located in the collection the return value is negative one (-1).

member.summary: Determines whether the specified item is located in the collection.
member.param: A representing the item to locate in the collection.
member.returns: true if the column is contained in the collection; otherwise, false.

member.summary: De-selects all the items.

member.name: T:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType
member.summary: Spefifies the data type to use for sorting the column

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType.None
member.summary: No sorting.

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType.String
member.summary: Sorts values as strings.

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType.Integer
member.summary: Sorts values as integers.

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType.Double
member.summary: Sorts values as doubles.

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType.Date
member.summary: Sorts values as DateTime.
member.remarks: Uses DateTime.Parse to convert the text into a DateTime. If it fails it will revert back to string comparisons. This will be very slow sort due to the large number of exceptions being thrown. If you expect to have a mixture of dates and strings, write your own custom sorter.

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.SortDataType.Custom
member.summary: Indicates that the sort algorithm should use a user defined IComparer. See the CustomSortComparer property. Handle exceptions yourself as this control will not. Your IComparer will receive the two s that need to be compared.
member.remarks: Do not worry yourself with SortOrder, that will be handled by the control automatically. Your job is to simply sort them in order.

member.summary: Vertical grid lines

member.summary: Both horizontal and vertical grid lines rendered.

member.name: T:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthBehavior
member.summary: Specifies how the width should behave when other columns or the list changes size.

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthBehavior.Normal
member.summary: Will not respond to other columns being resized

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthBehavior.MaintainPercent
member.summary: Will determine how much percentage of the list is being used and maintain that percentage

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ColumnWidthBehavior.Fill
member.summary: Will grow/shrink as needed to keep the list filled (will share excess evenly with other columns that have this behavior)

member.name: T:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior
member.summary: Specifies how the control should resize as part of a .

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior.None
member.summary: Width or height will not be altered

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior.HeightFit
member.summary: Height will be set to fill sub item height; width won't be changed

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior.HeightFitMaintainRatio
member.summary: Height will be set to fill sub item height; aspect ratio will be maintained

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior.WidthFit
member.summary: Width will be set to fill sub item width; height won't be changed

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior.WidthFitMaintainRatio
member.summary: Width will be set to fill sub item width; aspect ratio will be maintained

member.name: F:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ControlResizeBehavior.BothFit
member.summary: Both height and width will be set to fill entire sub item

member.name: T:DotNetLib.Windows.Forms.ContainerListView
member.summary: Provides a ListView control in detail mode that provides containers for each cell in a row/column. The container can hold almost any object that derives directly or indirectly from Control.

members.member: the visible portion of the header control
the visible portion of the detail area
each column header and the filler column
each area that will allow column resizing
each area that will allow column resizing
each area that will allow column resizing
